ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Regular EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No, it actually makes it tougher. There s no more single pulling, or FD splitting. If you get a mob linked with 3 other mobs, they re all coming, and you d
ygData.messageBody:
--- ej <naslund19@...> wrote:

> Wulfric Rennison wrote:
> > Now I guess instead of the little
> > color ring, you also get icons either above or
> below the NPC name that
> > shows exactly how tough they may be. Also if you
> have a mob and you
> > target one it shows you ALL the others that will
> come running if you attack.
>
> Talk about totally dumbing down the game.
>

No, it actually makes it tougher. There's no more
single pulling, or FD splitting. If you get a mob
linked with 3 other mobs, they're all coming, and
you'd better be ready for them.


=====
~~~~~~~~~

Sarchasm: The gulf between the author of sarcastic wit and the recipient who just doesn't get it.
